titleStmt.title: A brief narration of the practices of the churches in New-England. Written in private to one that desired information therein; by an inhabitant there, a friend to truth and peace. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Weld, Thomas, 1590?-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matth. Simmons for John Rothwell, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: An inhabitant there, a friend to truth and peace = Thomas Weld.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Sunne in Pauls Church-yard
